snippet: New applications can help diners locate a meal, and make sure that certain someone pays what he owes.
abstract: App City column on mobile apps Foodspotting, BiteHunter and Foodivide, all of which help users choose restaurants, find deals and split up the check.
lead_paragraph: New applications can help diners locate a meal, and make sure that certain someone pays what he owes.

headline.print_headline: Tricks to Finding Food And to Paying for It
headline.seo: Tricks to Finding Food, and to Paying for It
headline.main: Tricks to Finding Food and to Paying for It
